dmca.title: Born-Again-Christian.Info Complains of Infringement (#3)
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043 USA 
DMCA Complaint of Copyright Violation

I am the sole owner of the website born-again-christian.info, which has had original copyright material, authored by me, taken from it without permission and posted on webpages listed in Google. Please remove all the infringing pages from your index immediately, and kindly reply to: [private]@born-again-christian.info confirming your compliance with our request in accordance with DMCA 1998.

Here follow details of the infringement:

The copyrighted works at issue are the texts that appear on our website
at: http://wigglesworth.born-again-christian.info/smith.wigglesworth.sermons.pentecostal.htm
This is my original copyright material. 

And: http://www.born-again-christian.info/vision.htm
Note: This is our adaptation of a work in the Public Domain, but this
adaptation is copyright, and not in the Public Domain. 

The Infringer's website is: http://www.drsusanjacob.org
The infringing page appears here: http://www.drsusanjacob.org/news.htm

There are links to the infringing material at the top of every page on
the infringer's website, labelled 'Anointed Preachers'.
For example:
http://www.drsusanjacob.org/products.htm
http://www.drsusanjacob.org/services.htm

The infringer has combined the copyright texts from our site into one
article, without requesting or obtaining our permission, and has removed
our legitimate copyright notices.

Infringer: [private]@juno.com    [private]@drsusanjacob.org 

Statutory Declaration:

I, [private], have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted
materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I declare*, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

*NOTE: I am a Christian missionary, God's Word specifically commands me NOT to swear, just let your yes be yes. (Holy Bible, James 5:12; 'But above all things, my brethren, swear not, neither by heaven, neither by the earth, neither by any other oath: but let your yea be yea; and your nay, nay; lest ye fall into condemnation.') Therefore I don't swear anything, I simply declare the above to be true.
SIGNED: [private] DATE: 9th. August 2004
